name: react-loadable-revised
description: A higher order component for loading components with promises
author: Sang Tran <t@sang.jp>

scripts.build: yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm && yarn build:rename-esm
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --target es2015 --module commonjs --jsx react-jsx --declaration --inlineSourceMap --esModuleInterop --outDir ./ index.tsx babel.ts lib.ts webpack.ts
scripts.build:esm: tsc --moduleResolution nodenext --target es2015 --module es2015 --jsx react-jsx --declaration --inlineSourceMap --esModuleInterop --outDir esm index.tsx babel.ts lib.ts webpack.ts
scripts.build:rename-esm: for f in esm/*.js; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.js}.mjs"; done && for f in esm/*.d.ts; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.d.ts}.d.mts"; done
scripts.clean: rm -rf esm coverage example/dist node_modules/.cache babel.js babel.d.ts webpack.js webpack.d.ts index.d.ts index.js lib.d.ts lib.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn test
